name: Corn Chowder
recipeIngredient: 1 pkg (4 oz) Italian Classics Diced Pancetta
8 ears fresh corn, shucked, kernels removed

recipeInstructions.text: Add pancetta to pot on medium. Cook 2-3 min, until crispy. Add onion, celery, and garlic; stir. Cook about 4 min, until soft but not browned.
Add butter; stir until melted and it begins to bubble. Add flour, stirring until completely blended. Cook, stirring and scraping bottom of pot every 30 seconds, about 3 min.

Whisk in chicken stock. Add corn; whisk. Add peppers, potato, and thyme; season to taste with sea salt and freshly ground pepper. Increase heat to medium-high. Cook, stirring occasionally, about 10 min until it comes to a boil.
Reduce heat to medium. Simmer 10-15 min until potato is tender. Add cream gradually; stir. Return to simmer, about 2-3 min. Season with Tabasco and Old Bay.
